input.value: An error occurred while trying to fetch storage system id. No matching record(s) found.
An error occurred while trying to fetch storage pools for storage system or no matching record(s) found. Error:

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <xsl:for-each select="//StoragePool"> <item> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Name-</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="./name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">,Id-</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="./ID" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </item> </xsl:for-each> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: An error occurred while trying to fetch storage settings for storage pools or no matching record(s) found. Error:

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <xsl:for-each select="//output/command-response"> <item> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Name-</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="./Name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">,Id-</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="./ID" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </item> </xsl:for-each> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <command> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">create</xsl:text> </command> <category> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">pool</xsl:text> </category> <process-id> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">create-storage-pool</xsl:text> </process-id> <command-arguments> <size> <xsl:value-of select="//pool-size" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </size> <pool-ids>${pool id}</pool-ids> <storage-setting-id>${setting id}</storage-setting-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: An error occurred while creating storage pool. Error:
